mapper.select: select * from (SELECT ROWNUM NUM, m.* FROM (select c.*, l.lect_start_day, l.lect_end_day, l.lect_name, l.lect_person_num from lecture l, curriculum c where l.curri_id = c.curri_id) m ) where NUM between ((#{page}-1)*5)+1 and (#{page}*5)
mapper.insert:
select NVL(max(curri_id),0)+1 from curriculum
insert into curriculum(member_id, curri_id, curri_level, curri_subject, curri_content, curri_write_time) values(#{member_id}, #{curri_id}, #{curri_level}, #{curri_subject}, #{curri_content}, #{curri_write_time})
mapper.select: select * from (SELECT ROWNUM NUM, m.* FROM (select c.member_id, c.curri_subject, c.curri_level, l.lect_start_day, l.lect_end_day, l.lect_name, l.lect_person_num from lecture l, curriculum c where ${column} like '%' || #{keyvalue} || '%') m ) where NUM between ((#{page}-1)*5)+1 and (#{page}*5)
select count(*) from curriculum where ${column} like '%' || #{keyvalue} || '%'

select * from (select rownum rnum, m.* from (select c.*, l.lect_start_day, l.lect_end_day, l.lect_name, l.lect_person_num from lecture l, curriculum c where l.curri_id = c.curri_id) m ) where TO_DATE(lect_start_day,'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_DATE(#{start_day},'YYYY-MM-DD') and TO_DATE(lect_start_day,'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_DATE(#{end_day},'YYYY-MM-DD')

select c.*, l.lect_start_day, l.lect_end_day, l.lect_name, l.lect_person_num, l.lect_start_time, l.lect_end_time from lecture l, (select *from curriculum where curri_id=#{curri_id}) c where l.curri_id = c.curri_id
